name: Fallen Angel (itch) (ChickenNeko, ShawnTheSheep)
description:
GameJam: The gamejam is a  mini 24 hour or 1 day to make a game following said theme and special rule given by our school. It is a great way to level up our skills as professional game developer and artist. Give us a feeling of crunch time as it is 24 hour and help grow our communication skill with others. The Theme was Ascend, You may only pick ONE 4-color pallet from LoSpec and must only use the mouse for controls to play the game.

Description: Use your mouse to move the angel around the map level, left click to shoot an arrow, hold left click to shoot an even more powerful arrow. Avoid being touched by the demon and  get to heaven, each demon add to your score granting you new level upon reaching high enough score. Can you reach heaven or forever be a fallen angel. 

Game Programmer, Sound, Music: ShawnTheSheep(https://shawnthesheep.itch.io/)

Game Artist: ChickenNeko(https://chickenneko.itch.io/)

Color: https://lospec.com/palette-list/cga-palette-2-high

>This is Black>

Sounds: Shot 8, Hit 3(Assets bought long ago, they do not have who they were made from or specific name to them)  Death(ShawnTheSheep made this himself Woo!)

BGM: "Catch the Mystery" is the title of this music.

Play other Games from this Jam here now! https://itch.io/jam/game-gen-mini-jam-2020-05-12/entries
